message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled value and functionality. Considering its worth to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure this high-quality item at a fantastic rate. We believe this price reflects the exceptional value and benefits this product offers you.
I appreciate the offer, Alice. However, $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To find common ground, I propose to reconsider the pricing. Our revised offer for the product is $1150000. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while providing you with a substantial discount compared to our initial asking price. We believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests and your budget.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to reconsider the price. However, $1150000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counter with an offer of $1050000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial agreement. In light of your latest proposal, I am pleased to offer the product to you at a price of $1100000. This price reflects a significant discount from our original asking price, while still allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests and your budget.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, $1100000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counter with an offer of $1050000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To reach a conclusion, I propose to offer the product to you at a price of $1080000. This price is slightly above your last offer but still below our initial asking price. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests and your budget.

Alice, I appreciate your continued efforts to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, $1080000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counter with an offer of $1020000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a fair price for the product. In consideration of your latest offer, I am pleased to offer the product to you at a price of $1060000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our initial asking price and your budget, while still allowing us to maintain a satisfactory profit margin.

Alice, I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, $1060000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one last concession, so I'll counter with an offer of $1015000. If this is not acceptable, I'll have to consider purchasing the product from John for $1500000.
